channel.title: Mongodb Atlas as datasource test connection error
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I'm Trying to make Mongodb Atlas a Datasource but when i test the connection i keep on getting this error. ``` Connection Test Failed: The server is being accessed through a load balancer, but this driver does not have load balancing enabled ``` [it has a simlar issue with this one from scala mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/community/forums/t/scala-driver-2-9-0-connection-fails-with-loadbalancersupportmismatch/126525)
im using the default configurations of redash.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8.0 * Browser/OS: Ubuntu * How did you install Redash: aws AMI (ap-southeast-1)
